name: Flamingo Quest
description:
A story about a Flamingo I know

A short game I made for Glorious Trainwrecks, it's about a girl raised by flamingos, called Flamingo. It's set in the Top-Secret Neon-Pink Planet universe, but you don't need to play anything else I've made to understand it. It can stand on its own.

Was originally not going to release it on itch, but thought actually it fits in fine here alongside my other work. It's not very long, but I really like it and had a lot of fun making it.
